name: Lost in the Cosmos
description:
A short game made for a 3-day game jam with the theme "Heaven."

Help the helicopter rover "Eco" traverse the clouds in its search for complex life on another planet. Will it find life, or will it fail in its mission?

The limitation for the jam was that the player character had to be an inanimate object. I used the theme in both the setting of the game and in the overall story, in which the rover is slowly dying and thinking about its goal and how it wants to achieve it above all else.
